creator: nitin.chawke@gmail.com
text:
I would like to know the feasibility of below:
1. We specify the ramp up details
2. After all the users are in the system, I want to run them all together (repeate) for few mins before they ramp down.

Can someone pls advise if this is possible, if yes, how?

Thanks

Bugzilla is not a support forum.

Please subscribe to the JMeter user list and ask there.
creator: sebb@apache.org
